alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 21 at 7:16PM MDT until June 23 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek At Colorado Springs affecting El Paso County. Fountain Creek Near Fountain affecting El Paso County. Fountain Creek Near Pinon affecting Pueblo County. .Heavy rainfall will cause Fountain Creek to rise above flood stage later tonight through tomorrow morning. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain, Pinon, Pueblo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Pinon. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor agricultural flooding occurs south of Pinon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 12.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Fountain Creek Pinon 12.0 5.2 Wed 6 pm MDT 9.4 MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 715 AM MDT.
